parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>0.76

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Remote Control

</value></part><part><name>gr2</name>=<value> Object Detection

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Return a list of all UAV vehicles.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[allUnitsUAV]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Array]] of [[Object]]s - Array of UAV vehicles

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[hint]] [[format]] ["Number of UAV(s) on the map: %1", [[count]] [[allUnitsUAV]]];</code>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>{ _x [[setDamage]] 1 } [[forEach]] [[allUnitsUAV]];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[unitIsUAV]], [[allCurators]], [[allGroups]], [[allDead]], [[playableUnits]], [[switchableUnits]], [[vehicles]], [[allDeadMen]], [[agents]], [[showUAVFeed]], [[shownUAVFeed]], [[getConnectedUAV]], [[UAVControl]], [[connectTerminalToUAV]], [[isUAVConnected]]
</value></part></template>

<dl class='command_description'>
<comment><!-- Note Section BEGIN -->
</comment>
<dd class="notedate">Posted on October 10, 2014 - 01:23 (UTC)</dd>
<dt class="note">[[User:AgentRevolution|AgentRevolution]]</dt>
<dd class="note">
This command returns a list of all unmanned '''vehicles''', not the UAV AI units inside them, as the name might otherwise suggest.
</dd>

<comment><!-- Note Section END -->
</comment></dl></root>
